We used the popular Wireshark tool to trace traffic during a log on to a non-TLS z/VM system, and can easily locate the user ID and password in the stream. 3.5.2 Enabling TLS for z/VM TN3270 server In this section, we provide an example of how to configure TLS to protect TN3270 communications with z/VM. For this example, we demonstrate how the Ansible system management tool and its OpenSSL modules (running on Linux) can be used to create and manage certificates that secure z/VM communication.
